Installation

Requirements

  • Python 3.7 or higher

  • pip (Python package installer)

Install from PyPI

pip install vargula

Upgrade

pip install --upgrade vargula

Install from Source

git clone https://github.com/crystallinecore/vargula.git
cd vargula
pip install -e .

Verify Installation

import vargula as vg
print(vg.__version__)
print(vg.style("Test", color="green", look="bold"))

Platform Notes

  • Windows: Auto-enables ANSI support on Windows 10+

  • macOS: Works out of the box

  • Linux: Works in all modern terminals

Dependencies

Zero external dependencies - uses only Python standard library.
